name: SSLAuthenticate
desc: The flags that represent the requirements for client-side authentication.

items.name: case neverAuthenticate
items.desc: Indicates that client-side authentication is not required. (Default.)

items.name: case alwaysAuthenticate
items.desc: Indicates that client-side authentication is required.

items.name: case tryAuthenticate
items.desc: Indicates that client-side authentication should be attempted. There is no error if the client doesnâ€™t have a certificate.
